summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4751 for the construction of a trunk sewer and subsewer along West Hanford Street and Hanford Street, from the East Waterway to Empire Way, and along certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, under Ordinance No. 54960, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
